alert.note: Alert for Austin; Inland Harris; Waller (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 21 at 2:39AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Austin, northwestern Fort Bend, central Waller and west central Harris Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 239 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over San Felipe, or near Sealy, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sealy, Hempstead, Prairie View, Brookshire, Waller, Pine Island, San Felipe, Pattison and Monaville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
